name: NexusCommerce â€” Full-Stack E-Commerce & AI Microservices Platform
description: A comprehensive full-stack e-commerce platform built with microservices architecture, featuring AI-powered recommendations, multi-database support, and cloud-native deployment on AWS with Kubernetes.

name: Terraform AWS EC2 POC (Beginner Friendly)
description: A simple Terraform project that creates a server on AWS EC2. The server runs Amazon Linux 2 and has Nginx installed. Terraform also makes an SSH key so you can log in. Good for beginners learning cloud and Terraform.

name: Vue 3 + Vite + AWS S3 Deployment
description: This is a Vue 3 app built with Vite, deployed to AWS S3 and CloudFront using GitHub Actions.

name: NestJS + Docker + AWS EC2
description: A simple Proof of Concept backend app built with NestJS, containerized using Docker, and deployed to an AWS EC2 instance.
